name: plasticfantastic
tagline: A Java library for bank card numbers
body:
**plasticfantastic** is a Java library for working with bank card numbers. It can identify the card type, and validate the number.

## Distribution

### Gradle/Maven
The library is available from the wonderful [jitpack.io](https://jitpack.io/#com.github.www.vaughandroid/plasticfantastic)

### Jar
You can download the Jars from the [github release page](https://github.com/vaughandroid/plasticfantastic/releases)
